content: *this pattern is part of the hobbii x pica pau advent 2025 calendar* **size** one size **measurements** height approx 29 cm / 11 5 **materials** pica pau cotton 8/7 nude 1 skein of color 03 buttermilk pica pau cotton 8/7 1 skein of color 20 olive brown 1 skein of color 08 dusty pink 1 skein of color 37 black rainbow 8/4 glitter gold 1 skein of color 02 natural white gold crochet hook 2 75 mm / us c2 2 safety eyes 8 mm stuffing tapestry needle stitch marker **yarn quality** pica pau cotton 8/7 nude hobbii 100% cotton 50 g 1 75 oz = 90 m 98 yds pica pau cotton 8/7 hobbii 100% cotton 50 g 1 75 oz = 90 m 98 yds rainbow 8/4 glitter gold hobbii 95% cotton 5% polyester 50 g 1 75 oz = 155 m 169 yds **gauge** 10 stitches = 4 cm / 1 5 measured horizontally in one round to make the stitches more tight use the x shaped single_crochet yarn under **pattern information** owen stoat is an intermediate project worked in a continuous spiral to keep track of the rounds you may use a stitch marker or safety pin to mark the beginning of a round the head and the body are worked in a single piece for the body of the stoat we use two strands of rainbow 8/4 glitter gold crocheted together owen stoat also has 2 accessories a vest and a scarf remember that it s always advisable to give the entire pattern a read before starting crocheting and most importantly be patient with
